Room.Name: Center Courtyard
Room.ShortDescription: This is the exact center of the ground floor courtyard of Castle Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: A reflecting pool takes up most of the center area of the courtyard. There are several statues around the edge and in the center, and together they tell the story of the struggle between the twins, Prince Rutger and Prince Ragnar, for the crown of their dead father, King Lyanden.
